mapper.select: select t.id, t.name, t.description, t.tag_type_code, t.misc, t.active, s.quantity from tag t join (select carrier_id id, sum(no_duplicates * volume) quantity from hold group by carrier_id) s on t.id=s.id where t.tag_type_code in ('S','TT','TR') and t.active = 'Y' order by 2

select t.id, t.name, t.description, t.tag_type_code, t.misc, t.active, coalesce(s.quantity,0) quantity from tag t left outer join (select carrier_id id, sum(no_duplicates * volume) quantity from hold group by carrier_id) s on t.id=s.id where t.id = #{param1}
